pcd.ass03.ex01.actors

Class RefereeActor

  • java.lang.Object
    • akka.actor.AbstractActor
      • pcd.ass03.ex01.actors.RefereeActor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    akka.actor.Actor

    public final class RefereeActor
extends akka.actor.AbstractActor
    Represents the entity that coordinates actions inside the match

      • activePlayers

        private final java.util.Set<akka.actor.ActorRef> activePlayers
        It memorized all not-excluded players.

      • currentLap

        private final java.util.List<akka.actor.ActorRef> currentLap
        Keeps track of the current 'turn lap'; for every turn, a player will be removed from the list. When the is empty, it will be re-initialized randomly.
